section.title: Overview
section.abstract: A sketch of a philosophical position (metaphysical positivism) by contrast with caricatures of aspects of various prior philosophies.

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: first philosophy was the term used by Aristotle in his Metaphysics as philosophy concerned with first causes and ultimate principles. By contrast philosophy in the twentieth century has sometimes been characterised as norrowly concerned with certain kinds of analysis.
